Tricorder-RaspberryPi

general_pages package

Contains definitions for pages other than sensor I/O.

general_pages.brightness_slider_page module

Implements functions for backlight control.

note

The project uses a Pimoroni Hyperpixel Square. The brightness is controlled through PWM.

class general_pages.brightness_slider_page.BrightnessSliderPage(name)

Bases: PageTemplate

! This page used for adjustubg screen brightness (i.e. backlight level) through pigpio commands

! Retrieve current backlight level

next_frame(screen, curr_events, **kwargs)
set_brightness(curr)

! Set backlight level

transition_events(screen, curr_events)

! To handle sliding on slider.

class general_pages.brightness_slider_page.SliderClass(start_x, y_pos, button_width, button_height, length=100, min_val=0, max_val=249, start_val=None)

Bases: object

! A class for implementing slide switches
